|brand = Hawking |model = HWL2 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Female Mini-B |formfactor = corded (modular) adapter
|vendor_id = 0ace |device_id = 1211 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = SOY-HWL2 |icid = 6169A-HWL2 |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:0E:3B
|chip1 = ZyDAS;ZD1211; |chip2 = Airoha;AL2230; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/02/2005 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 603992505807 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- Newegg number --> |asin = B0009WE9G0 |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This is a rather simplistic WiFi-detector, unlike the U-MEDIA ones. It doubles as a ZyDAS based USB adapter.
[http://www.mail-archive.com/zd1211-devs@lists.sourceforge.net/msg00409.html zd1211rw log with HWL2]
